tooltip: Select Valanavi, Queen of All Fairies, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Queen Valnavi focuses on upgrading the Fairies with powerful techs.
Allows you to summon Queen Valanavi, a Mage hero that attacks with freezing magic.
Hovering support unit with a ranged magical attack.
Misthenge Techs are free to research.
All Fairy Buildings now obscure enemy Line of Sight.
